remarks: Rule of specialization, using implicit substitution.  Compare Theorem 7.3 of [Quine] p. 44.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Jan-2017.)
statement:
spcimgf.1 $e |- F/_ x A $.
spcimgf.2 $e |- F/ x ps $.
spcimgf.3 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph -> ps ) ) $.
spcimgf $p |- ( A e. V -> ( A. x ph -> ps ) ) $.
